statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 4 , x^{3} + x^{2} - x + 5 , 20 \, x^{3} - 16 \, x^{2} - 16 , -17 \, x^{3} + 10 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 2 , -2 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + x - 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
